Author: throwaway199502
Text: Feeling this right now. I saw a recent picture from 15 pounds ago and it’s like looking at a totally different person. I keep trying to think, what went wrong? I feel like we get into bad habits quickly. One binge can easily turn into two, then three, etc. Then suddenly people stop making the ‘skinny’ comments. Then maybe the weight gain comments start. Then before you know it, square one. It sucks.
